thread.title: Wall St. plunges as stocks selloff continues

title: Wall St. plunges as stocks selloff continues
text:
Wall St. plunges as stocks selloff continues Tuesday, February 06, 2018 - 00:46 
U.S. stocks plunged in highly volatile trading on Monday, with the Dow industrials falling nearly 1,600 points at its lows - the biggest intraday point drop in history - as a long-expected pullback from record highs deepened. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
